content: repeat round 1 until cuff measures 1 inch taking note of previous row how many rounds you worked so you can work an equal row 1 rs sl 1 wyib k18 20 22 24 sks k1 turn number on the second sock k 4 rounds then continue row 2 ws sl 1 wyif p7 p2tog p1 turn to leg section row 3 sl 1 k to 1 st before the gap sks k1 turn row 4 sl 1 p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn leg repeat row 3-4 until 20 22 24 26 sts remain ending the charts should always be read from right to left when after a row 4 continue to gusset working the stranded portions of the charts catch floats longer than five stitches work the white squares for color a and work the black squares for color b join color b and change to larger needles rnds 1-20 with larger sized needles work chart a around heel flap break color b and switch to smaller needles k 16 18 20 22 move the next 32 36 40 44 to a waste yarn or a stitch holder to be picked up later turn and p 32 36 40 44 row 1 right side sl 1 wyib k1 to end of row turn row 2 wrong side sl 1 wyif p to end of row turn #lattesandllamas #geekalong #shiftersocks |for personal use only | © lattes & llamas | page 5 gusset foot with rs facing sl 1 wyib k across the remaining 19 21 continuing where you left off in the gusset section 23 25 sts from the heel turn section pick up and work chart c around until you have finished all 29 rnds knit 1 in each of the next 6 5 8 7 slipped sts on the break color a and change to smaller edge of the heel flap pm to signify the new beginning needles of round pick up and knit 1 in each of the next 12 13 14 15 slipped sts on the edge of the heel flap pm to indicate the top of the gusset pick up and knit 1 into sizes 2 and 4 only move the start of round marker each of the remaining 0 2 0 2 slipped sts 2 sts to the left by removing the marker knitting 2 sts then replacing the marker return the next 32 36 40 44 sts from your waste yarn or stitch holder to needles work across these sts by all sizes k all rounds with color b until the foot slipping all color b sts wyib and knitting the color a sts measures 6 7 8 9 or 1 5 less than desired length pick up and k 1 in each of the next 0 2 0 2 slipped sts on the edge of the heel toe round 1 set up k 32 36 40 44 sts pm k to end pm to indicate top
